name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by thedice, ezcmac, atticusonline, lk, Afkpuz, heatbag, nickb285, Darthemed)

name: delzhand
text: I always thought it was the mustache, but Culpepper's is white...

name: centipede_damascus
text: As soon as you can explain Teodor's similar mouth in a previous strip, sure.

name: adhesion
text: Might be a reference to Klaus Nomi who has been referenced many a time.

name: rowboat
text: Maybe it's Maybelline.

name: dumase
text: maybe its more than that

name: overmedicated
text: Maybe he's born with it.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: Nah, it's Maybelline.

name: bilingualmonkey
text: Man, there's serious kudos going your way in setting that one up.

name: snowman
text: Why can't it be true?

name: morypcaina
text: A comment left by morypcaina was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, Crowpaw, Tragic_Johnson)

name: jttuba
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: laserblade
text: BOO TO THAT

name: dusty
text: Since Lie Bot's mouth is metal he had to paint it black so that when the mouth of the mask opened you didn't see metal inside, but darkness.

name: thaklaar
text: Man, I was gonna chubby this, but no.  Your pedestrian, common-sense explanation has a certain elegance to it, but it ruins the mystery.  Why's everything gotta have a reason?  Let the freaky black mouth be a freaky black mouth, man.

name: dusty
text: You can still wonder at how Onstad noticed that.

name: anzio
text: I'm just gonna chubby it anyways, because I like answered questions.

name: serious_man
text: how is asherdan showing up consistantly as the first comment?

name: serious_man
text: liiiie boooooot!

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, alphagator, kenthegod, _cheesekayke, ActualTaunt, muddgirl, excusemesenator)

name: slalvation
text: Who cares? It is also a funny way out.

name: rowboat
text: And to think that I only recently became familiar with the concept of deus ex machina.

name: lawbot
text: Machina ex deus?

name: rowboat
text: NO

name: lawbot
text: I have no idea what I was thinking. The only thing this calls to mind is the song "Deus me faca funky," which is not at all apposite.

name: dj_douche
text: You were really not surprised by a cat, who dresses and acts like an old-fashioned man from the American south, turning out to be a pathologically-lying robot in disguise? Really?

name: garlic_breath
text: I thought it was great.  I love that line, "What a mendacious burlesque!"

name: epicurus
text: I was a little disappointed that it turned out to be Lie Bot because now we don't know what Uncle Culpepper is actually like.

name: zem
text: I think the idea is that Lie Bot did a perfect imitation of him

name: lawdog
text: Kudos for a brilliant adaptation of classic Scooby-Doo plot resolution. The sound effect is even spot on.

name: zefiel
text: I would have gotten away with it if it wasn't for you meddling cats! And, uh, well, no, no dog.

name: bixschmix
text: Scrambles was pulling the strings all along...

name: ezcmac
text: A comment left by ezcmac was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, erincandy, Taidje_Khan)

name: tetrisattack
text: Alt text: Lie Bot!

name: cdtm
text: DUN DUN DUNNNNNNN!

name: tttt
text: brilliant

name: gompo
text: The best part of this strip is definitely Doc Andretti totally ignoring Lie Bot and Ray in the first panel and just walking on by with a real patient with real problems.

name: nice_enuf_guy
text: Uh, I think Ray is referring to Roast Beef on the gurney in question. Indeed, RB is a real patient with real problems...unlike Lie Bot. Great arc!

name: siah
text: Someone ruined this one in the comments of a comic a little bit back or else i would probably like it more.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, Deusoma, tttt2, rowboat, Jeef, anitrophaeron, stormagnet, slalvation)

name: i_love_kate
text: That's what I call a circumstance.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Hey man, some of us just happened to not have heard of it up until a certain point. (Would like to point out at this point that I have read the entire archive, I just didn't sign up straight away.)

Come on, man. "Newbie"-scorn is SO 2006.

name: mattylite
text: Super-Tip: read them all first, THEN go back through and do the comments thing.  Or else like every single strip will sound familiar from when someone references it.

name: saddestking
text:
Imagine now the guy who gets all the way up to June 2004, reads your comment, goes "ohhhh" and kind of quietly slaps his forehead

That guy

was

me

OOOOOOOHHHHHHH SSSSHHHIIIIITTTT !

name: theplaidknight
text: That should not have to be a super-tip.  Spoilers are like poison:  if you give them to people, you should be killed.

name: cagliostro
text:
I, too, am beginning to feel this might have been wise. But never mind! When you make a mistake, stick to it doggedly as things gradually fall to pieces around you.

(I'm also discovering that various assets I thought were hilarious are actually cold stolen from the strip. I remembering laughing out loud at an early 'Some of it got on the mayor!' because it seemed such a random and inspired thing to say, and then a hundred-odd strips later, my face fell and another fragment of my innocence died whimpering.)

name: cagliostro
text: Remembering? What? Fucking me I can't stopping using participles!

name: mikeleffel2
text: HA HA I have read this arc repeatedly since it originally aired and never once noticed those lips until now! :) Also I learned that Phillipe is going to be 5!!!

name: ggvaidya
text: *gasp*!

name: joeyramoney
text: why is lie bot wearing lipstick?

name: taidje_khan
text: If there is a lie, Lie Bot will tell that lie.

name: charchar
text: I love how Uncle Culpepper calls it "a mendacious burlesque" and then begins unzipping Lie Bot.

name: achilleselbow
text: I've still got three years to go in the archive. Please, please don't tell me this is why I haven't seen Lie Bot in the most recent strips.

name: unsentletter
text: FUCK YOU LIE BOT!

name: skaterpix
text: I should have known!

name: sweetlips
text: What a twist!

name: mrectomy
text: DUN DUN DUUUUUUN

name: grenzdebil
text: i love how lie bot wears sunglasses even under a mask.

name: carlyle
text: Am I to assume the whole deal, the mask, clothes, faking the outfit, the gun, etc. was for Lie Bot to get it on with Tina?

name: pwnchu
text: Doctors usually get pretty annoyed by the demand, "Cold fix ____ up!"

name: yaotzin
text: Maybe it's velcro to hold the mask in place? But then, how was liebot able to make the mask smaller than his actual head, and be round and not look Frankenstein's Monster in appearance?

name: i_love_kate
text: I like to imagine that this strip might alternatively have ended with Uncle Culpepper's evil twin, Clancy, screaming and clutching at his bleeding head, from which Ray just tore his ears.
